meanings.definition: A brown coloration of the skin caused by exposure to the sun.
meanings.sent1: Her suntans made her look like she had been in the sun all day.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy having suntans during the summer months.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's suntans from playing outside all day made her cheeks rosy.
meanings.sent4: His suntans were like a badge of honor from his time spent at the beach.
meanings.sent5: The suntans on his face and arms showed he had been enjoying the sunny weather.

meanings.definition: To become brown from exposure to the sun.
meanings.sent1: I suntans easily whenever I spend time outdoors.
meanings.sent2: She suntans quickly whenever she goes to the beach.
meanings.sent3: The cat loves to suntans in the warm patch of sunlight by the window.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden suntans beautifully under the bright sun.
meanings.sent5: He suntans gradually as he relaxes on the deck chair in the backyard.
